com.aspose.words
Class SummarizeOptions

java.lang.Object
    com.aspose.words.SummarizeOptions

public class SummarizeOptions 
extends java.lang.Object

Allows to specify various options for summarizing document content.

Example:

Shows how to summarize text using OpenAI and Google models.
Document firstDoc = new Document(getMyDir() + "Big document.docx");
Document secondDoc = new Document(getMyDir() + "Document.docx");

String apiKey = System.getenv("API_KEY");
// Use OpenAI or Google generative language models.
AiModel model = ((OpenAiModel)AiModel.create(AiModelType.GPT_4_O_MINI).withApiKey(apiKey)).withOrganization("Organization").withProject("Project");

SummarizeOptions options = new SummarizeOptions();

options.setSummaryLength(SummaryLength.SHORT);
Document oneDocumentSummary = model.summarize(firstDoc, options);
oneDocumentSummary.save(getArtifactsDir() + "AI.AiSummarize.One.docx");

options.setSummaryLength(SummaryLength.LONG);
Document multiDocumentSummary = model.summarize(new Document[] { firstDoc, secondDoc }, options);
multiDocumentSummary.save(getArtifactsDir() + "AI.AiSummarize.Multi.docx");

Constructor Summary
SummarizeOptions()
           Initializes a new instances of SummarizeOptions class.
 
Property Getters/Setters Summary
intgetSummaryLength()
voidsetSummaryLength(int value)
           Allows to specify summary length. Default value is SummaryLength.MEDIUM. The value of the property is SummaryLength integer constant.

Document secondDoc = new Document(getMyDir() + "Document.docx");

String apiKey = System.getenv("API_KEY");

Property Getters/Setters Detail

getSummaryLength/setSummaryLength

public int getSummaryLength() / public void setSummaryLength(int value)
Allows to specify summary length. Default value is SummaryLength.MEDIUM. The value of the property is SummaryLength integer constant.

Example:

Shows how to summarize text using OpenAI and Google models.
Document firstDoc = new Document(getMyDir() + "Big document.docx");
Document secondDoc = new Document(getMyDir() + "Document.docx");

String apiKey = System.getenv("API_KEY");
// Use OpenAI or Google generative language models.
AiModel model = ((OpenAiModel)AiModel.create(AiModelType.GPT_4_O_MINI).withApiKey(apiKey)).withOrganization("Organization").withProject("Project");

SummarizeOptions options = new SummarizeOptions();

options.setSummaryLength(SummaryLength.SHORT);
Document oneDocumentSummary = model.summarize(firstDoc, options);
oneDocumentSummary.save(getArtifactsDir() + "AI.AiSummarize.One.docx");

options.setSummaryLength(SummaryLength.LONG);
Document multiDocumentSummary = model.summarize(new Document[] { firstDoc, secondDoc }, options);
multiDocumentSummary.save(getArtifactsDir() + "AI.AiSummarize.Multi.docx");
